alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Mellette; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 6:31PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Todd, northwestern Tripp, Mellette and southeastern Jackson Counties through 715 PM MDT/815 PM CDT/... At 631 PM MDT/731 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Corn Creek to 5 miles west of Swift Bear to 2 miles east of Antelope. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mission, White River, Norris, Wood, Cedar Butte, Mosher, Soldier Creek, Black Pipe, Butte Creek, Swift Bear, Ring Thunder, Antelope, Horse Creek, Corn Creek, Haystack Butte and northeastern Rosebud Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
